name: User Rights History
description: Displays the user rights for a project at any point in time.

project-settings.name:
Restrict DAG User Display: Choose whether to restrict display of user rights to only those users in the current Data Access Group
Users not currently assigned to a DAG will be able to see all users regardless.
Default is to restrict display to the current DAG only

choices.name: Restrict viewing to the currently selected Data Access Group
Show all users in all Data Access Groups

project-settings.name:
Disable the logging table for all users: Disable the logging table completely.
Default is to keep the logging table enabled

Restrict Logging for DAG Users: Choose whether to disable the logging feature for users currently in a Data Access Group
Default is to restrict access

choices.name: Disable Logging access for users in a DAG
Allow all users to see all logging

project-settings.name:
Restrict User Access: Choose whether to restrict access to certain users in the project or to allow access to all users.
If you choose to restrict access, you will be able to select which individual users have access to this module.
Default is to allow all users to access the module

choices.name: Allow access to all project users

project-settings.name: Select which users should have access to view this module

crons.cron_description: Checks every minute for changes in projects that have the module enabled
